result.execSummary:
The defendant Scott A Manthei was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety, 6 month probation review hearing to be conducted
AODA and comply with any recommendations

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant's probation terminated on 3-26-16; unpaid supervision fees of $200
from Agent Adriane Wilder - probation review
Judgment of Conviction mailed to defendant at 207 W Cook Street #522, Portage was returned marked "return to sender, not deliverable as addressed"
probation review hearing on September 29 at 11:15
and Notice of Right to Seek Post Conviction Relief filed by defendant/counsel

Defendant Scott A Manthei in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Amended Complaint filed in 14 CF 451, 14 CF 452 and 14 CF 481, waives reading, Rights/Elements, Defendant pleads no contest to Ct. 4 in 14 CF 451, Ct. 3 in 14 CF 452, Ct. 4 in 14 CF 481, Judgment to be entered, 14 CF 302, 14 CF 451, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, Ct. 3, 14 CF 452, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, 14 CF 481, Ct. 1, Ct. 2, Ct. 3 dismissed, read in, 14 CF 451, Ct. 4, 14 CF 452, Ct. 3,  and 14 CF 481, Ct. 4, Court withholds sentence, probation 12 months, 14 CF 451, Ct. 4, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review, 1 day jail credit, 14 CF 452, Ct. 3, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review hearing, 1 day sentence credit,  14 CF 481, Ct. 4, maintain absolute sobriety, AODA and comply, $443.00 costs, 6 month probation review hearing, 2 days sentence credit, bond to be applied, defendant to report to Probation and Parole Office by Noon today,

Defendant Scott A Manthei in court with attorney Roger L. Klopp.  Troy D Cross appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Klopp requesting prelim,  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 26, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant, Scott A Manthei, appeared pro se. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reset all cases.  Hearing scheduled for February 18, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

Defendant Scott A Manthei in court, in custody with attorney Randall M. Holtz.  Crystal N Long appeared for the State of Wisconsin. waives reading of complaint, right to atty recited, $500.00 cash bond, standard felony conditions, absolute sobriety, waives time limits to prelim,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 5, 2014 at 10:40 am.  Hearing scheduled for December 17, 2014 at 02:45 pm.
